description:
In liberty nova/virt/vmwareapi/vm_util.py
def get_cluster_ref_by_name(session, cluster_name):
    """Get reference to the vCenter cluster with the specified name."""
    all_clusters = get_all_cluster_mors(session)
    for cluster in all_clusters:
        if (hasattr(cluster, 'propSet') and
                    cluster.propSet[0].val == cluster_name):
            return cluster.obj
when all_cluster is None,this code may cause error:TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable,and nova-computer would't up
title: vmwareapi get vcenter cluster

comments.content:
In liberty nova/virt/vmwareapi/vm_util.py
def get_cluster_ref_by_name(session, cluster_name):
    """Get reference to the vCenter cluster with the specified name."""
    all_clusters = get_all_cluster_mors(session)
    for cluster in all_clusters:
        if (hasattr(cluster, 'propSet') and
                    cluster.propSet[0].val == cluster_name):
            return cluster.obj
when all_cluster is None,this code may cause error:TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable,and nova-computer would't up
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hawkerous

comments.content: The code in mitaka (master) appears to be the same so this would need to be confirmed on master, fixed (on master) before it would be considered for liberty
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~o-tony

comments.content: If you can reproduce this on master and include a backtrace that'd be very helpful.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~o-tony

comments.content: linbing if you are still working on this please assign it back to yourself. There have been no patches proposed in over 4 months so I'm removing the assignee for now so that others feel free to pick this up.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alaski

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/257674
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=621191f1d6a6c3f98966069dafac8ca6701f8567
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 621191f1d6a6c3f98966069dafac8ca6701f8567
Author: linbing <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jun 16 03:57:13 2016 -0700

    VMware: Fix bug of TypeError when getting reference of VCenter cluster is None.
    
    * When get VCenter of all cluster reference and return None, it's  a
      NoneType, and could not be iterable, so it will cause error like
      ：“TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable ”.
    
    * This patch add the situation of cluster reference is None, and will
      return an empyt list.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1525913
    Change-Id: Ifcf0e1edf378f239030a27e40d5bed436876858b
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 14.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~doug-hellmann
